name: specialist-orders.toml

description.summary: List of orders assigned to the specialist

rawContent:
# Specialist Orders Route
# List of assigned orders

[route]
id = "specialist-orders"
path = "/prototype/specialist/orders"
title = "My Orders"

[page]
type = "authenticated"
role = "specialist"

[page.description]
summary = "List of orders assigned to the specialist"
features = [
  "Assigned orders list",
  "Order details",
  "Start shift action"
]

[relations]
guards = ["authenticated", "specialist-only"]
roles = ["specialist"]
entities = ["order"]
platforms = ["specialist-app"]

[implementation]
component = "SpecialistOrders"
file = "src/prototype/pages/specialist/SpecialistOrders.tsx"
status = "planned"
